segments.text: Didn't you say your friend was American ? Where is she going on her honeymoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a coincidence ! These pajamas would be perfect to take along on the honeymoon !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're probably right . Oh , what the heck ! I'll take it all ... in maroon , like you said .
segments.speaker: S2
